verses.verse: וַיְהִי֩ <WH1961> become אִ֨ישׁ <WH376> man אֶחָ֜ד <WH259> Now there was a certain מִן־ <WH4480> at הָרָמָתַ֛יִם צוֹפִ֖ים <WH7436> of Ramathaimzophim מֵהַ֣ר <WH2022> of mount אֶפְרָ֑יִם <WH669> Ephraim וּשְׁמ֡וֹ <WH8034> and his name אֶ֠לְקָנָה <WH511> [was] Elkanah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֹחָ֧ם <WH3395> of Jeroham בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֱלִיה֛וּא <WH453> of Elihu בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son תֹּ֥חוּ <WH8459> of Tohu בֶן־ <WH1121> the son צ֖וּף <WH6689> of Zuph אֶפְרָתִֽי׃ <WH673> an Ephrathite

וְלוֹ֙ שְׁתֵּ֣י <WH8147> And he had two נָשִׁ֔ים <WH802> wives שֵׁ֤ם <WH8034> the name אַחַת֙ <WH259> of the one חַנָּ֔ה <WH2584> [was] Hannah וְשֵׁ֥ם <WH8034> and the name הַשֵּׁנִ֖ית <WH8145> of the other פְּנִנָּ֑ה <WH6444> Peninnah וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> had לִפְנִנָּה֙ <WH6444> and Peninnah יְלָדִ֔ים <WH3206> had children וּלְחַנָּ֖ה <WH2584> but Hannah אֵ֥ין <WH369> had יְלָדִֽים׃ <WH3206> had no children

וְעָלָה֩ <WH5927> went up הָאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> man הַה֤וּא <WH1931> And this מֵֽעִירוֹ֙ <WH5892> out of his city מִיָּמִ֣ים ׀ <WH3117> yearly יָמִ֔ימָה <WH3117> yearly לְהִֽשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֧ת <WH7812> to worship וְלִזְבֹּ֛חַ <WH2076> and to sacrifice לַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> unto the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts בְּשִׁלֹ֑ה <WH7887> in Shiloh וְשָׁ֞ם <WH8033> there שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> And the two בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> sons עֵלִ֗י <WH5941> of Eli חָפְנִי֙ <WH2652> Hophni וּפִ֣נְחָ֔ס <WH6372> and Phinehas כֹּהֲנִ֖ים <WH3548> the priests לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיְהִ֣י <WH1961> came הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> And when the time וַיִּזְבַּ֖ח <WH2076> offered אֶלְקָנָ֑ה <WH511> was that Elkanah וְנָתַ֞ן <WH5414> he gave לִפְנִנָּ֣ה <WH6444> to Peninnah אִשְׁתּ֗וֹ <WH802> his wife וּֽלְכָל־ <WH3605> all בָּנֶ֛יהָ <WH1121> and to all her sons וּבְנוֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH1323> and her daughters מָנֽוֹת׃ <WH4490> portions

וּלְחַנָּ֕ה <WH2584> But unto Hannah יִתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> he gave מָנָ֥ה <WH4490> portion אַחַ֖ת <WH259> a אַפָּ֑יִם <WH639> worthy כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אֶת־ <WH853> חַנָּה֙ <WH2584> Hannah אָהֵ֔ב <WH157> for he loved וַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> but the LORD סָגַ֥ר <WH5462> had shut up רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <WH7358> her womb

וְכִֽעֲסַ֤תָּה <WH3707> also provoked צָֽרָתָהּ֙ <WH6869> And her adversary גַּם־ <WH1571> again כַּ֔עַס <WH3708> her sore בַּעֲב֖וּר <WH5668> because of הַרְּעִמָ֑הּ <WH7481> for to make her fret כִּֽי־ <WH3588> her because סָגַ֥ר <WH5462> had shut יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> because the LORD בְּעַ֥ד <WH1157> up רַחְמָֽהּ׃ <WH7358> her womb

וְכֵ֨ן <WH3651> It יַעֲשֶׂ֜ה <WH6213> And [as] he did שָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> so year בְשָׁנָ֗ה <WH8141> by year מִדֵּ֤י <WH1767> when עֲלֹתָהּ֙ <WH5927> she went up בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> to the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD כֵּ֖ן <WH3651> after that תַּכְעִסֶ֑נָּה <WH3707> so she provoked וַתִּבְכֶּ֖ה <WH1058> her therefore she wept וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not תֹאכַֽל׃ <WH398> and did not eat

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> Then said לָ֜הּ אֶלְקָנָ֣ה <WH511> Elkanah אִישָׁ֗הּ <WH376> her husband חַנָּה֙ <WH2584> to her Hannah לָ֣מֶה <WH4100> why תִבְכִּ֗י <WH1058> why weepest וְלָ֙מֶה֙ <WH4100> and why לֹ֣א <WH3808> not תֹֽאכְלִ֔י <WH398> thou? and why eatest וְלָ֖מֶה <WH4100> and why יֵרַ֣ע <WH3415> grieved לְבָבֵ֑ךְ <WH3824> thou not? and why is thy heart הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not אָֽנֹכִי֙ <WH595> I ט֣וֹב <WH2896> ? [am] not I better לָ֔ךְ מֵעֲשָׂרָ֖ה <WH6235> to thee than ten בָּנִֽים׃ <WH1121> afflicted

וַתָּ֣קָם <WH6965> rose up חַנָּ֔ה <WH2584> So Hannah אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> after אָכְלָ֥ה <WH398> they had eaten בְשִׁלֹ֖ה <WH7887> in Shiloh וְאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> and after שָׁתֹ֑ה <WH8354> they had drunk וְעֵלִ֣י <WH5941> Now Eli הַכֹּהֵ֗ן <WH3548> the priest יֹשֵׁב֙ <WH3427> sat עַל־ <WH5921> on הַכִּסֵּ֔א <WH3678> upon a seat עַל־ <WH5921> by מְזוּזַ֖ת <WH4201> by a post הֵיכַ֥ל <WH1964> of the temple יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהִ֖יא <WH1931> She מָ֣רַת <WH4751> And she [was] in bitterness נָ֑פֶשׁ <WH5315> of soul וַתִּתְפַּלֵּ֥ל <WH6419> and prayed עַל־ <WH5921> unto יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD וּבָכֹ֥ה <WH1058> and wept תִבְכֶּֽה׃ <WH1058> sore

וַתִּדֹּ֨ר <WH5087> And she vowed נֶ֜דֶר <WH5088> a vow וַתֹּאמַ֗ר <WH559> and said יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> O LORD צְבָא֜וֹת <WH6635> of hosts אִם־ <WH518> if רָאֹ֥ה <WH7200> if thou wilt indeed תִרְאֶ֣ה ׀ <WH7200> look בָּעֳנִ֣י <WH6040> on the affliction אֲמָתֶ֗ךָ <WH519> of thine handmaid וּזְכַרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <WH2142> and remember וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> shall never תִשְׁכַּ֣ח <WH7911> me and not forget אֶת־ <WH853> אֲמָתֶ֔ךָ <WH519> thine handmaid וְנָתַתָּ֥ה <WH5414> but wilt give לַאֲמָתְךָ֖ <WH519> unto thine handmaid זֶ֣רַע <WH2233> child אֲנָשִׁ֑ים <WH376> then וּנְתַתִּ֤יו <WH5414> then I will give לַֽיהוָה֙ <WH3068> him unto the LORD כָּל־ <WH3605> all יְמֵ֣י <WH3117> all the days חַיָּ֔יו <WH2416> of his life וּמוֹרָ֖ה <WH4177> and there shall no razor לֹא־ <WH3808> shall never יַעֲלֶ֥ה <WH5927> come עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH7218> upon his head

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> came כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הִרְבְּתָ֔ה <WH7235> And it came to pass as she continued לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> praying לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְעֵלִ֖י <WH5941> that Eli שֹׁמֵ֥ר <WH8104> marked אֶת־ <WH853> פִּֽיהָ׃ <WH6310> her mouth

וְחַנָּ֗ה <WH2584> Now Hannah הִ֚יא <WH1931> she מְדַבֶּ֣רֶת <WH1696> she spake עַל־ <WH5921> in לִבָּ֔הּ <WH3820> in her heart רַ֚ק <WH7535> but שְׂפָתֶ֣יהָ <WH8193> only her lips נָּע֔וֹת <WH5128> moved וְקוֹלָ֖הּ <WH6963> but her voice לֹ֣א <WH3808> was not יִשָּׁמֵ֑עַ <WH8085> was not heard וַיַּחְשְׁבֶ֥הָ <WH2803> thought עֵלִ֖י <WH5941> therefore Eli לְשִׁכֹּרָֽה׃ <WH7910> she had been drunken

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלֶ֙יהָ֙ <WH413> then עֵלִ֔י <WH5941> And Eli עַד־ <WH5704> against מָתַ֖י <WH4970> to her How תִּשְׁתַּכָּרִ֑ין <WH7937> unto her How long wilt thou be drunken הָסִ֥ירִי <WH5493> ? put away אֶת־ <WH853> יֵינֵ֖ךְ <WH3196> thy wine מֵעָלָֽיִךְ׃ <WH5921> and

וַתַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered חַנָּ֤ה <WH2584> And Hannah וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> and said לֹ֣א <WH3808> neither אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> No my lord אִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> I [am] a woman קְשַׁת־ <WH7186> of a sorrowful ר֙וּחַ֙ <WH7307> spirit אָנֹ֔כִי <WH595> I וְיַ֥יִן <WH3196> neither wine וְשֵׁכָ֖ר <WH7941> nor strong drink לֹ֣א <WH3808> nor שָׁתִ֑יתִי <WH8354> I have drunk וָאֶשְׁפֹּ֥ךְ <WH8210> but have poured out אֶת־ <WH853> נַפְשִׁ֖י <WH5315> my soul לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

אַל־ <WH408> not תִּתֵּן֙ <WH5414> Count אֶת־ <WH853> אֲמָ֣תְךָ֔ <WH519> not thine handmaid לִפְנֵ֖י <WH6440> for בַּת־ <WH1323> a daughter בְּלִיָּ֑עַל <WH1100> of Belial כִּֽי־ <WH3588> out מֵרֹ֥ב <WH7230> for out of the abundance שִׂיחִ֛י <WH7879> of my complaint וְכַעְסִ֖י <WH3708> and grief דִּבַּ֥רְתִּי <WH1696> have I spoken עַד־ <WH5704> until הֵֽנָּה׃ <WH2008> now

וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered עֵלִ֛י <WH5941> Then Eli וַיֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said לְכִ֣י <WH1980> Go לְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace וֵאלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> and the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel יִתֵּן֙ <WH5414> grant אֶת־ <WH853> שֵׁ֣לָתֵ֔ךְ <WH7596> [thee] thy petition אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> you שָׁאַ֖לְתְּ <WH7592> that thou hast asked מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with

וַתֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> And she said תִּמְצָ֧א <WH4672> find שִׁפְחָתְךָ֛ <WH8198> Let thine handmaid חֵ֖ן <WH2580> grace בְּעֵינֶ֑יךָ <WH5869> in thy sight וַתֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went הָאִשָּׁ֤ה <WH802> So the woman לְדַרְכָּהּ֙ <WH1870> her way וַתֹּאכַ֔ל <WH398> and did eat וּפָנֶ֥יהָ <WH6440> and her countenance לֹא־ <WH3808> was no הָיוּ־ <WH1961> become לָ֖הּ עֽוֹד׃ <WH5750> longer

וַיַּשְׁכִּ֣מוּ <WH7925> early בַבֹּ֗קֶר <WH1242> in the morning וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ֙ <WH7812> and worshipped לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיָּשֻׁ֛בוּ <WH7725> and returned וַיָּבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> and came אֶל־ <WH413> to בֵּיתָ֖ם <WH1004> to their house הָרָמָ֑תָה <WH7414> to Ramah וַיֵּ֤דַע <WH3045> knew אֶלְקָנָה֙ <WH511> and Elkanah אֶת־ <WH853> חַנָּ֣ה <WH2584> Hannah אִשְׁתּ֔וֹ <WH802> his wife וַיִּֽזְכְּרֶ֖הָ <WH2142> remembered יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> and the LORD

וַיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came לִתְקֻפ֣וֹת <WH8622> was come הַיָּמִ֔ים <WH3117> Wherefore it came to pass when the time וַתַּ֥הַר <WH2029> had conceived חַנָּ֖ה <WH2584> about after Hannah וַתֵּ֣לֶד <WH3205> that she bare בֵּ֑ן <WH1121> a son וַתִּקְרָ֤א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמוֹ֙ <WH8034> his name שְׁמוּאֵ֔ל <WH8050> Samuel כִּ֥י <WH3588> Because מֵיְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> him of the LORD שְׁאִלְתִּֽיו׃ <WH7592> [saying] Because I have asked

וַיַּ֛עַל <WH5927> went up הָאִ֥ישׁ <WH376> And the man אֶלְקָנָ֖ה <WH511> Elkanah וְכָל־ <WH3605> all בֵּית֑וֹ <WH1004> and all his house לִזְבֹּ֧חַ <WH2076> to offer לַֽיהוָ֛ה <WH3068> unto the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> זֶ֥בַח <WH2077> sacrifice הַיָּמִ֖ים <WH3117> the yearly וְאֶת־ <WH853> נִדְרֽוֹ׃ <WH5088> and his vow

וְחַנָּ֖ה <WH2584> But Hannah לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not עָלָ֑תָה <WH5927> went not up כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for אָמְרָ֣ה <WH559> for she said לְאִישָׁ֗הּ <WH376> unto her husband עַ֣ד <WH5704> for יִגָּמֵ֤ל <WH1580> be weaned הַנַּ֙עַר֙ <WH5288> [I will not go up] until the child וַהֲבִאֹתִ֗יו <WH935> and [then] I will bring וְנִרְאָה֙ <WH7200> him that he may appear אֶת־ <WH853> פְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְיָ֥שַׁב <WH3427> and there abide שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there עַד־ <WH5704> until עוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> ever

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said לָהּ֩ אֶלְקָנָ֨ה <WH511> And Elkanah אִישָׁ֜הּ <WH376> her husband עֲשִׂ֧י <WH6213> unto her Do הַטּ֣וֹב <WH2896> thee good בְּעֵינַ֗יִךְ <WH5869> what seemeth שְׁבִי֙ <WH3427> tarry עַד־ <WH5704> until גָּמְלֵ֣ךְ <WH1580> until thou have weaned אֹת֔וֹ <WH853> אַ֛ךְ <WH389> only יָקֵ֥ם <WH6965> establish יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> him only the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> דְּבָר֑וֹ <WH1697> his word וַתֵּ֤שֶׁב <WH3427> abode הָֽאִשָּׁה֙ <WH802> So the woman וַתֵּ֣ינֶק <WH3243> suck אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנָ֔הּ <WH1121> and gave her son עַד־ <WH5704> until גָמְלָ֖הּ <WH1580> until she weaned אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַתַּעֲלֵ֨הוּ <WH5927> him she took him up עִמָּ֜הּ <WH5973> with כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> after גְּמָלַ֗תּוּ <WH1580> And when she had weaned בְּפָרִ֤ים <WH6499> bullocks שְׁלֹשָׁה֙ <WH7969> with her with three וְאֵיפָ֨ה <WH374> ephah אַחַ֥ת <WH259> and one קֶ֙מַח֙ <WH7058> of flour וְנֵ֣בֶל <WH5035> and a bottle יַ֔יִן <WH3196> of wine וַתְּבִאֵ֥הוּ <WH935> and brought בֵית־ <WH1004> him unto the house יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD שִׁל֑וֹ <WH7887> in Shiloh וְהַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> and the child נָֽעַר׃ <WH5288> [was] young
וַֽיִּשְׁחֲט֖וּ <WH7819> And they slew אֶת־ <WH853> הַפָּ֑ר <WH6499> a bullock וַיָּבִ֥יאוּ <WH935> and brought אֶת־ <WH853> הַנַּ֖עַר <WH5288> the child אֶל־ <WH413> to עֵלִֽי׃ <WH5941> to Eli

וַתֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> And she said בִּ֣י <WH994> Oh אֲדֹנִ֔י <WH113> my lord חֵ֥י <WH2416> liveth נַפְשְׁךָ֖ <WH5315> [as] thy soul אֲדֹנִ֑י <WH113> my lord אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I am הָאִשָּׁ֗ה <WH802> I [am] the woman הַנִּצֶּ֤בֶת <WH5324> that stood עִמְּכָה֙ <WH5973> beside בָּזֶ֔ה <WH2088> here לְהִתְפַּלֵּ֖ל <WH6419> by thee here praying אֶל־ <WH413> to יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> unto the LORD

אֶל־ <WH413> about הַנַּ֥עַר <WH5288> For this child הַזֶּ֖ה <WH2088> this הִתְפַּלָּ֑לְתִּי <WH6419> I prayed וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> hath given יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> and the LORD לִי֙ אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאֵ֣לָתִ֔י <WH7596> me my petition אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which שָׁאַ֖לְתִּי <WH7592> which I asked מֵעִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with
